Translations.Text: The human is indeed in loss
Except those who believe, do good works, support one another with the truth, and support one another with perseverance
Who gathered his wealth and counted it
He thinks that his wealth will make him immortal
Never! He will be thrown into the Destroyer
And do you know what is the Destroyer
Which reaches the inside of the hearts
Have you not seen what your Lord did to the people of the elephant
Did He not cause their schemes to go astray
And He sent down upon them swarms of birds
Striking them with rocks made from hardened clay
Until He turned them like devoured hay
